text: Events that only occur in sequence |+ — Represent these events as a state andselection attribute in the class described by the statechart diagram. Every time one of the involved events occurs, the system shall assign a new value to the state attribute. e — Integrate the attributes of the involved events into the class. Events that occur in iterations e — Represent these events as a new class; attach them to the class described by the statechart diagram using an aggregation structure. For each iteration, the system shall generate a new object from the class. e Integratetheeventattributesinto the new class. Figure 12.5: Guidelines for representing private events
